ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c, 'Daily Billing and Daily Payment - 17 basis points (0.17%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 15, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 17, Basis_Points__c <> 17 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
